name: clear
description: Commands to tidy up the server and users

subcommands.name: timeouts
subcommands.description: Cancels all of the active timeouts

subcommands.name: nicknames
subcommands.description: Clears all nicknames from server members

subcommands.name: role
subcommands.description: Removes a specified role from any users who have it

options.name: role
options.description: The role to remove from all members

subcommands.name: bot
subcommands.description: Cleans up messages posted by the bot

subcommands.name: user
subcommands.description: Deletes recent messages from a specified user

options.name: target
options.description: The @mention or 18-digit ID of a user

subcommands.name: all
subcommands.description: Deletes a number of messages (default 5) from all users

options.name: amount
options.description: The number of messages to delete
